TopicTitle: Amazing shuttle video from the equally amazing Vaos human.

Articles.Content:
Feast you eyes, zero reaction wheels, zero cockpit torque!! Stock.

Edited October 27, 2015 by Majorjim

Super Sweet Cinematic Tribute to the Space Shuttle Discovery, a must see, thanks for sharing this one!

Edited November 2, 2015 by castille7

Super Sweet Cinematic Tribute to the Space Shuttle Discovery, a must see, thanks for sharing this one!

A pleasure, more people should see his amazing craft. No SAS or RCS on ascent!?

And, yes the Discovery tribute was awesome. And a complete breakdown of the build too!

Edited November 2, 2015 by Majorjim

Yanks for share Majorjim. I really have a ton of respect for those that can pull off builds this complex. By using stock parts but also balance there design so it not only looks good but also works exactly as it should. I had to use Sarbians ssme mod in order to pull of my shuttle builds.

So mad props to the purists

Yanks for share Majorjim. I really have a ton of respect for those that can pull off builds this complex. By using stock parts but also balance there design so it not only looks good but also works exactly as it should. I had to use Sarbians ssme mod in order to pull of my shuttle builds.

So mad props to the purists

As far as I am aware it is the first KSP stock shuttle that does not require any added stability for ascent.
It sounds like the craft file is being shared but I haven't seen it on here are on KerbalX, is the file available for download somewhere?

It sounds like the craft file is being shared but I haven't seen it on here are on KerbalX, is the file available for download somewhere?

It is here with his other stuff, top of the list: http://kerbal.curseforge.com/members/Vaos3712/projects
